alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Piscataquis and north central Penobscot Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 114 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Moosehorn Crossing, or 28 miles northwest of Patten, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moosehorn Crossing, Grand Lake Seboeis and Grand Lake Matagamon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis
